content: summer stripes sunburst blanket pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/summerstripesblanket this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy when hot summer beach days turn to cool bonfire nights the summer stripes throw is the go-to bring along to cozy up in perfectly packable for your weekend getaways add a pom-pom border and you have the hottest blanket this summer this pattern is worked up using the large sunburst granny square the pattern uses scheepjes stone washed sport weight 78% cotton 22% acrylic 142yds/50g and a 4mm hook size g the final blanket size was approximately 44 x 55 inches pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legend - yarn recommendations/links - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graph - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny square used large sunburst granny square - written and video tutorial for border - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the joining method happy crocheting everyone l m
